name: Demon Quest (Starlight_Studio)
description:
Join Tobiasu On A Big Adventure To Stop The Demon God There's Slot Of Obstacles He Must Conquer In Order To Complete His Quest You'll Meet Many Friends Along The Way And Fight Powerful Monsters To Defeat The Demon God  And His 8 Dark Masters will you claim the adventure king title

The Game Is Still In Development So Hope You Donate And  Support My Development
